Planning.Title: Planning
Planning.Description: We'll collaborate to map out your website's goals, target audience, and key functionalities. We'll discuss things like structure, navigation, and content.

Development.Title: Development
Development.Description: Once we agree on the plan, i dive into coding. From initial sketches to polished code, I keep you updated every step of the way.

Launch.Title: Launch
Launch.Description: This is where the magic happens! Based on the approved design, I'll translate everything into functional code, building website from the ground up.
